name: Geometric Brothers
description:
Geometric characters join a chaotic rumble of battling and racing!
Experience exhilarating gameplay with simple controls!
Up to six players can enter the fray!

Battle
Fight your way through an array of stages featuring their own mechanics and an arsenal of unique weapons!
Achieve victory with split-second decisions and tactics!

Race
There's one more trial on the road to proving your might!
Use every tool at your disposal to reach the goal before anyone else!

Create
Make original stages for both battling and racing!
Combine traps, obstacles, and weapons in endless combinations!
Once your stage is ready, put it to the test with a battle of epic proportions!

*Controllers are required for multiplayer play.
